The goal of project is been the creation of a broker between the e-commerce Magento and SAP. In particular has been created a scheduled job in which the SEPIS reads the pending orders in Magento and performs the VA01 in SAP, create the customer if don't exist, changes the status of order in Magento in automatic way. For this project has been choice of using Spring WS for interact with SOAP Web Services of Magento, an ad-hoc company framework upon SAP JCo and Spring for help call of bapi. For scheduling has been used Quartz with the Spring facilities.
